translations: [兽医] 牛瘟；[兽医] 牛疫

sentences.sentence: Some areas of the world escaped rinderpest.
sentences.translation: 世界上某些地区逃脱了牛瘟感染。

sentences.sentence: Rinderpest can spread quickly through the air and in water containing waste from animals with the virus.
sentences.translation: 牛瘟可以通过空气和被含有病毒的动物粪便污染了的水来传播。
